model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Co-workers B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Co-workers A: I'm the boss!
Co-workers B: Yeah, we know. You don't have to remind us every five minutes.
Co-workers A: I just want everything to go smoothly and according to plan.
Co-workers B: I understand that, but it doesn't always have to be your way or the highway.
Co-workers A: Well, I just think that my way is usually the best way.
Co-workers B: And sometimes it is, but we all have different ideas and perspectives to bring to the table.
Co-workers A: Okay, I see your point. I'll try to be more open-minded in the future.
Co-workers B: That's all we can ask for. Remember that we're a team and we all have something valuable to contribute.
Co-workers A: You're right. I'm glad we can have these conversations and work towards being better together.

[MEMORY]
[Co-worker B acknowledges Co-worker A's good work ethic and the positive impact it has on the workplace.] - (React) - [Co-worker A and Co-worker B excel at working well with others and resolving issues.] - (React) - [Co-worker B appreciates Co-worker A's effort in giving them a massage to help them relax.] 
[Co-worker B acknowledges Co-worker A's good work ethic and the positive impact it has on the workplace.] - (SameTopic) - [Both Co-worker A and Co-worker B value communication and understanding in relationships.] - (SameTopic) - [Both Co-worker A and Co-worker B enjoy connecting with each other to make work more enjoyable.] 
[Co-worker B acknowledges Co-worker A's good work ethic and the positive impact it has on the workplace.] - (React) - [Co-worker A and Co-worker B excel at working well with others and resolving issues.] - (React) - [Co-worker A's massage to Co-worker B helps them feel relaxed and at peace.]
